doc.name: mobileBusyIndicatorStart
doc.summary: Displays an animated activity indicator on the screen

description.overview: Use the mobileBusyIndicatorStart command to show a native busy indicator on iOS and Android.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Specifies the type of animation that is to be displayed. The default is "square".

option.description: Displays a standard, native busy indicator in the center of the screen.

parameter.name: message
parameter.description: Specifies the message that is to appear on the busy indicator dialog.

parameter.name: opacity
parameter.description: Specifies the opacity of the busy indicator, which can lie in the range 0 - 100. The default value is 42. This option is only available for iOS.

description.comments:
Use the mobileBusyIndicatorStart command to display a native busy indicator on the top of the LiveCode stack that is running.
You can turn the busy indicator off by calling mobileBusyIndicatorStop.
